sentence: Israel's  air-and-ground  assault  on  Gaza  has  killed  more  than  20,000  people  in  the  10  weeks  since  the  Hamas-led  attack  on  Israel  killed  some  1,200  people  and  took  more  than  240  others  hostage.

Israel's  air-and-ground  assault  on  Gaza  has  killed  more  than  20,000  people  in  the  10  weeks  since  the  Hamas-led  attack  on  Israel  killed  some  1,200  people  and  took  more  than  240  others  hostage.
